comments:

This is fixed and checked in as of day/time of this comment (the tocextpoint.xml that is missing simply wasn't checked into CVS and so didn't make it through the build...it's now in there).  

Fix will be in ECF's RC1+1 Europa build contribution Wed 23rd.

Thanks for the report.
